help: Shows all commands, or info about 1 command
ping: Gets the API response time about the bot
purge:
ADMIN ONLY
Purge up to 100 Messages youngert than 2 weeks
stop:
OWNER ONLY
Stops the bot from running
Only Use in Emergency
slowmode:
ADMIN ONLY
Changes the slowmode of a channel
roll: Roll a die with as many sides as you want
cookie:
Give a cookie to someone...
Hope they aren't allergic to Gluten
